messages.content:
## Senior Full‑Stack Developer Market Overview – Africa (2025‑2026)

---
### 📊 Demand Forecast (12‑month outlook)
| Month | Demand Index |
|-------|--------------|
| Jan 2026 | 102 |
| Feb 2026 | 105 |
| Mar 2026 | 110 |
| Apr 2026 | 112 |
| May 2026 | 115 |
| Jun 2026 | 118 |
| Jul 2026 | 121 |
| Aug 2026 | 124 |
| Sep 2026 | 128 |
| Oct 2026 | 132 |
| Nov 2026 | 135 |
| Dec 2026 | 138 |

**Growth Rate:** ~2.5 % per month (≈38 % total increase year‑over‑year).

---
### 💰 Salary Insights (median annual, USD)
- **Median:** $115,000
- **10th percentile:** $90,000
- **90th percentile:** $150,000
> Salaries are higher in South Africa and Nigeria, with a noticeable premium for expertise in cloud platforms.

---
### 🛠️ Top Tech Stacks in Recent Postings
| Rank | Technology | Frequency |
|------|------------|-----------|
| 1 | React | 92 |
| 2 | Node.js | 88 |
| 3 | Docker | 85 |
| 4 | Vue | 81 |
| 5 | Kubernetes | 79 |
| 6 | Angular | 77 |
> **Note:** Cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP) appear in ~68 % of postings, with AWS leading.

---
### 📌 Actionable Takeaways
- **Hiring focus:** Prioritize candidates proficient in React and Node.js, complemented by containerisation (Docker/Kubernetes) skills.
- **Compensation planning:** Offer salaries at or above the median to attract top talent, especially in high‑growth hubs like Nairobi, Lagos, and Johannesburg.
- **Talent development:** Upskill existing staff on emerging cloud services and modern front‑end frameworks to stay ahead of demand.

---
